about.texto1: Passionate about technology, bachelor's degree in computer science from Vila Velha University (UVV). I work as a Software Quality Analyst (QA) with experience in manual and automated testing. Proficient in requirements gathering, test design, and test execution.
about.texto2: Knowledge in test planning, test scenarios, test cases, testing pyramid, functional testing, non-functional testing, exploratory testing, and regression testing. Web automation testing with Ghost Inspector, Selenium, and Cypress. Database querying with SQL. Front-end and Back-end knowledge.
about.texto3: Dedicated, empathetic, determined, self-taught, highly motivated, quick learner, and effective team player.

tarefas: - Documentation, planning, and team assistance in QA
- Analysis of process flows and requirements
- Creation of automated tests in Cypress
- Planning and execution of daily activities according to team-defined deadlines, contributing to the smooth operation and quality of results.
- Test planning, test scenarios, test cases.
- Documentation of routines and system bugs.
- Web automation testing with Ghost Inspector, Selenium.
